landing.heroTitle: Protect Your Lung Health with AI
landing.heroSubtitle: Early detection of respiratory disease risks and real-time air quality monitoring in one trusted medical application.
landing.feature1Desc: Naive Bayes algorithm to predict risks of Asthma, COPD, and Infections.
landing.feature2Desc: Latest Air Quality Index (AQI) data from major cities in Indonesia.
landing.feature3Desc: Personalized health recommendations based on your test results.

statistics.title: Statistics & Correlation
statistics.subtitle: Analyze the relationship between air quality and disease risk

advice.good: Air quality is good. Safe for outdoor activities.
advice.moderate: Air quality is moderate. Sensitive individuals should limit prolonged outdoor activities.
advice.unhealthy: Unhealthy. Wear a mask and limit outdoor activities.
advice.veryUnhealthy: Very unhealthy! Avoid outdoor activities. Use indoor air purifier.
advice.hazardous: Hazardous! Stay indoors. Wear N95 mask if going outside is necessary.
